Talon:

"Tucson... Its beautiful... I dont know what to say"Talon smiled wh=
ile she took the compass and she said "I've tought that you have forgotten =
me, but i was mistaken... I'm very happy to see you again"

Talon Blushed, =
she felt overhelmed with happpines, after her heart was broken twice, she n=
ever tought that she was able to feel like right in that instant but at the=
 same time a part of her was feared to suffer again


From: Sandy 
Sent: Th=
ursday, April 01, 2010 7:54 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The=
 Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
Tucson looks to Talon and gather=
s all his courage at this point to finally speak up and start the conversat=
ion.

" When I couldn't see anything, you a great help in that first battle=
 we fought together.. I - don't think anyone else would have risked their l=
ife like you had, for me. A piece of " Old Junk" as Nightstrike put it.. Af=
ter that, you stuck by me when you didn't have to. That meant quite a bit t=
o me Talon. It still does. And now, in more ways than one.. I - meant what =
I said, you're more beautiful than I ever imagined before I could see what =
you looked like. And not only are you beautiful on the outside, you're also=
 beautiful on the inside."

He gently takes her hand.

" I'm sure you've he=
ard this from a lot of other bots but I mean every word honestly. And I'd b=
e honored if you could continue to be beside me not only in battle, but com=
panionship." 

He remembered an artifact, a tiny artifact that he had found=
 on Atlantis. A compass, which he was able to restore simply by feel alone.=
 The compass also held a tiny pearl inside, as part of its decoration. He t=
akes it out of his subspaced gauntlet, and presents it to Talon.

" Now I k=
now why I held onto this for so long. Before I left Atlantis, I was working=
 on restoring this artifact. It's nothing large, but, I know it's valuable.=
 I'd like you to have this."

The pearl sparkles as lights touch it.

--- I=

nything," said Perseus, returning the salute.

me out of the command center door, followed by
> Kenzo.
>

re the maximal in the CR chamber. I am Perseus, the leader of
> the Pasific=
us Maximals."
>

l tone. "If you
> need to interrogate someone, I have some experience with =
that and may be
> able to help." He turned to Tuscon, "May I accompany you?=
"
>

> Tucs=
on had gotten Lord Elder's message. He wasn't quite sure who

worked for, and was happy for the word up.
> 
> "Thank you Lord Elder, I sh=
ould have asked that before I left, my bad.
> Tucson Prime out. Sorry Lord =
Perseus, it was Lord Elder. I'm glad he
> contacted me because I didn't kno=
w that Nightstrike wasn't one of Hydras'
> men. But, I still need to questi=
on him of course. It's great to actually
> see you this time, sir."
> 
> He=
 salutes Lord Perseus, and then looks over to Talon who smiles back to

m. He had not forgotten her. He had strong feelings for her and was

 to see her for the first time.
> 
> " You're even more beautiful than I im=
agined before I could see you. When
> I'm finished, I'd really like to - we=
ll.. You know um, get to know you a
> little better.. Er... I'm not good at=
 this.. Anyway, I have to go."
> 
> He visibly turns a slight shade of red =
around his optics. He then gathers
> himself to prepare to question Nightst=
rike as to Unicron's intentions. He
> knew he had several things happening =
at once, and to be a Prime to him,
> meant he had to be well rounded. He al=
so felt that Unicron's objectives had
> something to do with the opression =
that was hovering over the planet. As
> always, he was curious as to why th=
ings were happening.
> 
> " If it's all right with both of you, I'd like to=
 ask Nightstrike some
> questions. When in doubt, seek the answers from unl=
ikely resources...
> Something I kind of learned on my own."
